data.text: @pocky__2 Pocky, we inform you that if the reservation will be made through another company, you must contact it to verify this information. We could only guarantee that the times will be sufficient in reservations issued directly from our system. Regards.

urls.title: Travel restrictions due to COVID-19
urls.description: Check the regulations, requirements and restrictions for travel established by the different countries. Plan your flight ensuring that you meet all the requirements to make your international trip.

data.text:
@pocky__2 Regarding the covid 19 requirements, we suggest you consult the following link to verify if you meet the conditions to enter the destination country.  https://t.co/LU9uwvLtRy
Let us know by DM in case of any additional questions. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa 2/

data.text: @hosperanza_ Hola Jake, that is correct, the Sapphire tier allows for an extra checked bag regardless of your cabin class. For more details on the benefits, you can visit our website https://t.co/UvJRkE6bTM . Kind regards.
@Seany9944 Hola, sorry for the delay. We've just answered your DM
@JessMoody89 Hola Jessica, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@flakoubay Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. The WiFi service is available on 90% of our fleet and we are working to increase this percentage. More details at https://t.co/asWqqLGoql . We remain at your disposal

data.text: @tobyD678 Hola, we've replied to the DM sent to our main profile. Regards
@IMMagazine Hola, our apologies for the situation, could we help you with something? Please let us know by DM. Thank you.
@BigBlueGetaways Hola Daniel, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@carlosvermut We understand Ina, could you please give us by DM all your booking details, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @sandeeppegasus Hola, thank you for contacting us, could you please tell us by DM all details including your IB Plus number, full passenger name and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advnace https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@Patrick_Thorn Hello Patrick, even though Iberia Express and Iberia use somehow the same name, and also, we are a part of the same group, we act like different carriers. If you have booked through the Iberia Express website, then you should reach out in order to get your query solved. Regards.

@JoanSmith67 Hola Joan, we are deeply sorry to read about that. Could you please let us know your claim code so we can review it? Iberia claim codes are similar to this example: E20160928-01234567. Please send us a DM. (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) . We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@JasonLawhead Thanks, Jason. We've replied your DM

urls.description: Reserva tu asiento, obtén tu tarjeta de embarque online y podrás ir directamente a la puerta de embarque.

data.text: @JasonLawhead Hola Jason, please clear all cookies from the browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device: https://t.co/zLqj7mnP0E . If it doesn't work, send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@domroch Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please check our DMs
@AnnaCanning7 Hola Anna, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Cl4uVB Thanks, Claudia
@Cl4uVB Sorry for the inconvenience, Claudia. We've replied your other tweet

data.text: @Cl4uVB Sorry to read this, Claudia. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@mhutchings1982 Hola Michael, do you have a PIR or a report? Have you opened it with BA opr with us? Please let us know by DM. Thank you.

@alisonvvort Hola Alison, sorry for the inconvenience. We can see that your colleagues sent you an email today with the answer to your claim. Unfortunately, since you didn't open a PIR (property irregularity report) at the airport, we're not able to process your request. Sorry
@claire_rielly Hola Claire, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your claim reference number and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Cl4uVB That is an international number you can dial from the USA. Regards.
@Cromes Hola Yvonne, could you send us the details by DM? Thank you.
@Cl4uVB Hola Claudia, please call +34 911776310. Thank you.
@Cl4uVB Hello Claudia, you can also send us the booking code by DM and we will give you the homologue code. Regards.
@Cl4uVB Hola Claudia, if it is a package, please call +34 911776310 or send an email to vacaciones.iberia@ba.com, there our colleagues will gladly help you. Regards.
@katiedaly_oc Hola Katie, yes we replied to it. Regards.
@rg8641 Hola, facilítanos el número de expediente de reclamación por DM para poder revisar. Saludos
@ExpatSRay Hola, please send us the details by DM and we will check if there is any update. Thank you.
@TracieDalyFBC Thank you.
@TracieDalyFBC We await for your information, Thank you.
@TracieDalyFBC Hola, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@AseanyDuncan Hola, we replied to your DM asking for some information, could you reply?  Thank you.
@AseanyDuncan Hola. Can you please confirm that you have purchased directly on our website? Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...) Regards.
@erichson Hola. We understand that you have been diverted because of weather conditions at your destination airport. Regards

urls.title: Log in to Twitter / Twitter
urls.description: Log in to Twitter to see the latest. Join the conversation, follow accounts, see your Home Timeline, and catch up on Tweets from the people you know.

data.text: @BWellnProspa Hola. Can you please confirm that you have purchased directly on our website? Please send full name, email and ticket number (075) in private. We remain at your disposal. Regards https://t.co/FDkogzEooU Regards
@BWellnProspa Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards
@BWellnProspa Hola. We are very sorry for what you tell us. Please send us a DM with all the details of your case. Kind regards.
@MozCris Hola Cris. We are sorry to read what you have shared with us. Everyone at Iberia knows the importance of providing the best service. Regards
@reperfiled2 Lamentamos los inconvenientes, hemos escalado tu solicitud, y en cuanto tengamos una respuesta te contactaremos a la brevedad a través del canal privado. Un saludo
@wildlyartistic Hola Daniel. We are sorry to read what you have shared with us. If we can assist you please let us know. Regards
@reperfiled2 Sentimos las molestias y agradecemos tu paciencia. Saludos.
@reperfiled2 Hola. Hemos dado respuesta a tus mensajes directos. Saludos.
@reperfiled2 Hola. Sentimos el tiempo que ha tomado el proceso. Vemos que el área encargada está trabajando en tu caso. Esperamos tener novedades, cuanto antes. Agradecemos tu paciencia. Saludos.

@eeeeebcux Hola, we are sorry for the delay in giving you an answer. At the moment we have not received news from the corresponding department, due to the volume of inquiries it is possible that the response takes longer than usual. We remain attentive, regards.

@MozCris Hola Cris, we are sorry you have this impression of us. We understand that we have a case in process with the holder of the previously query, we remain attentive in that way for any news, regards.

data.text: @wildlyartistic Hola Daniel, we have read your comments however we could not tell you anything different. At the moment it is important to wait for some update from our colleagues in the luggage center, for our part we remain attentive to these news, regards.

@santoga Hola, Gabriel: Sentimos mucho la incidencia con tu vuelo, desde aquí, te enviamos una disculpa. Te comentamos que hemos respondido a tu consulta a través de un mensaje directo. Quedamos a tu disposición, Saludos.

@wildlyartistic When a bag goes missing, our baggage center contacts the agents at the airport to ask them about your bag. Unfortunately, in order to update the information in your PIR, the baggage center must wait for an answer from the agents at the airport. We appreciate your patience
@wildlyartistic Most bags are located within 72h after the flight, but we cannot guarantee that it will be the case. Therefore, we are really unable to give you an estimative. Sorry

@wildlyartistic We're not able to precise, unfortunately. We kindly ask you to please wait for our colleagues' update and keep the original invoices related to your first necessity expenses for being without luggage. Kind regards

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @Malvent Please clear all cookies from the browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device. Notice that, if the error pops up, you need to click on ''continue'' more than 3 or 4 times https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG

@wildlyartistic We've just replied to your new DM. Please check. Unfortunately, you need to wait for a SMS or email from the baggage center. You'll be contacted as soon as they have any update about your bag's location and its delivery. Regards
@wildlyartistic You're welcome. Unfortunately, the bag still hasn't been located. Please check our DM
@Malvent Hola Marcelo, sorry for the inconvenience. To bypass the error message, you just need to keep clicking on ''continue''
@wildlyartistic Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@manuparias Hola Manuel, unfortunately, the direct flights on this route were only scheduled from june 1st to october 29th. Kind regards
@laliandujar Hola. Could you send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@nefste Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@fvigeland Hola Finn, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@caminoandco Hola Jenny, please send us in a DM with the details to check the available information. Kind Regards.

https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@dhall1ootball Hola Darren, please Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@nina_ccorrea Hola Marina, our colleagues will contact all the passengers to help them to get to their final destination. Please send us a DM if we can help you. Regards.
@Chris_theno9 Hola Christopher, could you send the name of the passengers and contact details by a DM please? Thank you.
@ExpatSRay Hola Steve, please send us the details by DM and we will check the available information. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@medbaba22 Hola Babe. We have answered your direct message. Kind regards.

@MikaelaParenti Hola Mikaela, to check the status of your case, please send us a direct message https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE with the file code associated with your claim. We await the information, regards.
@maxwell_salas Hola Maxwell, we are going to review your messages and we will give you an answer by that means, regards.
@Jeremy43330205 Jeremy, you must start the claim at the airport where you received the luggage with the airline that operated the last flight, regards.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @Jeremy43330205 Hola Jeremy, we inform you that if items have been removed from your luggage you must file a claim at the airport and file a police report .If he has not done so, we suggest you contact the baggage department by phone. Regards. https://t.co/qlaQPQyv0e

@ropaga94 Hola Roberto, we are sorry to read your comments and that the process is taking longer than expected. Please, if there is anything we can help you with from the social media department, send us a direct message with all the details. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@Jeremy43330205 Hello. We are very sorry for what you tell us. Did you file the claim at the airport? Do you have a PIR reference code? Please send us a DM with all the details. Kind regards.
@Yeliz30170546 We have sent you a new Dm. We will continue only from there, to avoid duplication of information. Kind regards.

@rg8641 Hola. Nos sorprende lo que nos comentas. hemos revisado y no tenemos ningún mensaje directo desde este perfil. De igual manera estamos a tu disposición para cualquier consulta. Un cordial saludo.

@simonjuanIII Hola Simon, this could be due to an special request asked to the flight's crew, unfortunately from this channel we don't have details on it. Let us know if we can assist you with anything else. Kind regards.

@LADV56797964 Hola, allow us to assist you from here. Please DM us with more details about your request along with your ticket number starting with 075 and reservation code so we can verify all the information. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII. Regards.

@gjh5tlgspgtkvto Hello, we are sorry to read your comment. If you have any requests that we can assist you with, please send us a DM with more information so we can verify the details from here. All the best. https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@reallyanastasia Hola, we have sent you an answer again through our direct message conversation. Regards.
@BovijnEdmund Hola, we have sent you a reply through our DM conversation. Regards.
@BovijnEdmund We send you a new DM. Regards.
@BovijnEdmund Hello. We have responded to your query through a direct message. Kind regatds.
@NicolasMaier80 Hello, Nicolas. We have responded to your query through a direct message. Regards.
@reallyanastasia Hola, we have responded to your direct messages requesting additional information. Regards.

@RichardTheAZN Richard, we're sorry we can't tell you something different from this department. In previous comments we have sent you our claim form, once our colleagues review the case they will send you an official response via email. Regards
@MozCris Thanks Cris, we proceed to review your direct messages. Kind regards.
@reperfiled2 Hola. Hemos respondido a tus MD's. Por favor lee nuestros comentarios acerca de tu consulta. Quedamos a disposición. Saludos.

@ryan_c814 ´Hola Ryan, we're sorry we can't tell you anything different at the moment. We remain attentive to the response of the area in charge, as soon as there are news we should be able to let you know. We appreciate your patience, regards.

@omars1234 Hola Omars, we are sorry you have this impression of us. We continue working to improve and provide you with a better service and experience on your next flight, we remain at your disposal for any new query. Best regards.
@reperfiled2 Hola. Hemos respondido a tus MD's. Por favor lee nuestros comentarios acerca de tu consulta. Quedamos a disposición. Saludos.

@reallyanastasia Hola, we do not know the details of your case so we would like you to give us all the information you consider important by DM to review and know how to assist you effectively. We remain attentive by that means, regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
